game.description: Retrieve the golden chalice from the enchanted library and return it to the high priest.
game.objective: Find the golden chalice hidden in the enchanted library.

tasks.description: Navigate to the entrance of the enchanted library.
Find the golden chalice hidden within the enchanted library.
Return the golden chalice to the high priest in Elmwood village.
tasks.objective: Deliver the chalice to High Priest Elandor.

game.title: The Golden Chalice
